overview: Women know how to use their bodies to fulfill their dearest desires. How, taking advantage of the weakness of men for sex things, they are able to make them perform the worst acts. Once Upon a time there was a rich countess who was bored in her great house. For a long time, her husband had let her go. She met a very poor and beautiful girl. The Countess decided to make her companion and to live with her in the grand chateau. To preserve this tender presence and this great love, the cede girl has all her desires and whims…
title: Les Suçeuses de mâles
